basics.name: Max Knee
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: A life long learner who loves to use all tools to develop and solve problems. Loves working on software from all parts of the stack. Front end, back end, dev ops, whatever it takes to get the job done.

work.summary: Worked on Smart Internet a web app so customers could manage their wireless gateways.

Worked on supporting and streamlining development and deployment of software. Fast and agile start up that provided a financial wellness platform that had a direct to consumer and business to business platform. Worked on supporting and releasing to TD Bank in Canada.
highlights: NodeJS, AWS infrastructure, one-click server deployments
Extensible Jenkins build pipeline for each business partner

work.summary: Created dynamic Drupal sites for non-profit and higher education institutions
highlights: Leveraged CSS grid frame works and SVG animations for exciting web experiences
Built http://nextstop.temple.edu a highly visible site to replace the admissions booklet

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
